extendedInfo.description: **New version 9.3.2!  Includes fixes for improved live scoring and the previous fix for the GPS issue some were experiencing.**Get the excitement of high school sports â including Friday night football â right on your mobile phone. Want to check your team's score? Curious how your rivals are doing? SportsDayHS has the most up-to-date news, scores, statistics, schedules and standings for more than 200 Dallas-area schools. Choose specific schools and individual sports to have final scores pushed to you without having to open the app.   And itâs all right at your fingertips. Brought to you by The Dallas Morning News

reviews.title: Useful App
reviews.comment: Updated & GPS problem seems to be fixed. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor user interface
reviews.comment: Can\'t imagine what was going through the tiny brains of the designers when they decided on the presentation layout.
reviews.author: Robby McBrayer

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Horrible app
reviews.author: Fernando Murillo

reviews.title: Needs Improvement.
reviews.comment: Decent app, but doesn\'t let me view the standings or stats of the games.
reviews.author: Markel Johnson

reviews.title: GPS Issue
reviews.comment: I am getting the GPS issue again. I uninstalled it and reinstalled it like  last time but it did not fix my problem
reviews.author: Cory Wagner

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed this app. Great to get live scores while i am at another game.  Last update keeps trying to turn on my GPS. Why?  You just need to give the scores.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GPS must stop checking
reviews.comment: Uninstall until there is option to disable checking my location. Not needed for a hs sports app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too slow... Very clunky interface...
reviews.comment: I do not know how this app has gotten this far without some setups overhaul!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Getting better
reviews.comment: When I first installed this app I was getting lot\'s of force closes but the latest update seems to have fixed it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Fits to only half the screen. Not formatted right at all! Hard to navigate. Glad it\'s free. Wouldn\'t pay a dime for it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: Marcos Osorto

reviews.title: Samsung blaze.
reviews.comment: Push notification still doesn\'t work, even after update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh!
reviews.comment: Decent, for the most part it does what it\'s supposed to but not sure why the scores are in a small square box surrounded by alot of wasted space.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Other than force close, this ap gives me nothing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bug Fix Statement From Developer for v7.6
reviews.comment: Apologies to all with the bugs of the Android version of this app.  We have fixed the live scoring issue, and the issue that caused some schools to show incorrect information.  Please, if you find a bug, have an issue or otherwise, please email us at websports@dallasnews.com.  We will promptly get back with you.  We appreciate your using the app. (I had to put in a star rating to submit this reply, so I put in a 3 to be fair)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GPS
reviews.comment: I don\'t understand why GPS turns on with this app. There is no need for it. It drains your battery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Keeps force closing and when you click on the school you want, it gives  you the wrong school! Why is there no options to save favorite schools??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Wont do ANYTHING. Clicked on SKYLINE, got South Grand Prairie games from LAST YEAR! If yoir gonna introduce a new app., AT LEAST have a clue what your doing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Won\'t open most of the time and when I try to get scores on Friday nights it force closes. At least I didn\'t pay for it.
reviews.author: A Google User
